TextView.android:text: “Furni Rent” is designed for a wide market, it’s not something to be designed for a niche crowd. Furni Rent is designed for everyone struggling out their to achieve their dreams, everyone who don’t yet have a reliable source of income, every single one who is still a student but want to have the best lifestyle, every co-op where they need new furnishing every once in a while, it’s designed for you and for me. “Furni Rent” is an app where you can rent the furniture based on your requirements and time frame. Say you need a few chairs for your place for about 1 month, and there you have an agreement of 1 month with the rental cost. and with that being said, you can increase the time frame you want the furniture for, from 1 month to 1 year. However, the app doesn’t allow you to rent the furniture for less than a month, unless it’s for a corporate meeting of a co-op environment, considering those as an exception.
